name: Ninjask
author: kirisAki
flavor_text: Because it moves so quickly, it sometimes becomes unseeable. It congregates around tree sap.

abilities.name: Molting
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may put a Shedinja from your discard pile onto your Bench.

attacks.name: X-Scissor
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.
